name: ai-coding-assistant
description: AI Coding Assistant - Your intelligent coding companion

scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for Node.js server'
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"

author: AI Coding Assistant Team
